original_text: And Solomon slept with his fathers and was buried in the city of David his father, and Rehoboam his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 아버지 다윗의 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 르호보암이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon slept with his fathers
and was buried in the city of David his father
and Rehoboam his son reigned in his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 르호보암이 그의 대신에 왕이 되었다
